SEARCH
Package ulb.infof307.g9.view.mods.study

Class CardView

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.view.mods.study.CardView
Direct Known Subclasses:
HoleCardView, MultiChoiceCardView, StandardCardView
public abstract class CardView extends Object
The view for the CardController. Displays a base Card. This view is used to display the card's sides and gives the ability to the user to use the text to speech feature.
